plugin.name: alpha
plugin.description: adds an alpha channel to video - constant or via chroma-keying

element.name: alpha
element.description: Adds an alpha channel to video - uniform or via chroma-keying
element.author: Wim Taymans <wim.taymans@gmail.com> Edward Hervey <edward.hervey@collabora.co.uk> Jan Schmidt <thaytan@noraisin.net>
